title: 直升机MOD如何修改伤害参数
author: 4022sun
txt_content: 如题，我想修改直升机MOD里的载具的各项参数，血量，装甲，模型什么的我都找到了，就是伤害怎么也找不到。希望知道的大佬帮帮我这个丑新吧！

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content:
武器的配置文件与载具本体无关，具体位置是：mcheli\assets\mcheli\weapons，以m134为例：
DisplayName = M134 Minigun
Type = MachineGun1
[color=#ff0000]Power = 8[/color]
Acceleration = 8.0
Explosion = 0
Flaming = false
Sight = MoveSight
Delay = 0
ReloadTime = 80
Round = 100
SoundDelay = 3
Accuracy = 4.0
; SetCartridge = model_name, Acceleration, Yaw, Pitch, ModelScale, Gravity, Bound
SetCartridge = cartridge, 0.0, 0, 0, 2.00, -0.04, 0.40
Sound = gun_l2_snd

MaxAmmo = 1600
SuppliedNum = 200
Item =  3, iron_ingot
Item =  3, gunpowder

复制代码

修改power即可

示例版本为1.71
